query:
UPDATE email_messages
        SET
            replying_to_id = update_data.new_replying_to_id,
            updated_at = NOW()
        FROM
            UNNEST($1::uuid[], $2::uuid[])
                AS update_data(message_id, new_replying_to_id)
        WHERE
            email_messages.id = update_data.message_id
            AND email_messages.link_id = $3
